title: 'Boots on the ground' and 'one for the road'

title: Michael Campbell: MND drug might 'give me an extra year or two'
description: Belfast actor Michael Campbell, also known as Michael Patrick, was diagnosed with the terminal disease in February 2023.
content:
A Belfast actor who won high praise for playing Richard III in a wheelchair, is hoping a new clinical trial drug will help him in his fight against Motor Neurone Disease (MND).

title: The Ashes 2025-26: Ben Stokes suffers adductor injury on day four of fifth Test in Sydney
description: England captain Ben Stokes leaves with the field with a right adductor injury on day four of the fifth Ashes Test against Australia in Sydney
content:
Captain Ben Stokes left the field on the fourth morning of the fifth Ashes Test to become yet another casualty of England's awful Ashes tour.

title: Woman in Mind review - play stands the test of time for its originality
description: Sheridan Smith’s disconsolate housewife seeks refuge in a fantasy world, in Alan Ayckbourn’s critique of the emptiness of married life
content: Susan is not the first woman battling inner demons in her middle years that Sheridan Smith has taken on for the West End stage. Before Alan Ayckbourn’s disconsolate housewife here, there was her superlative Shirley Valentine, navigating middle-age wo... [3162 chars]

title: Rangers have dragged themselves back into title race - but Rohl wants more
description: Rangers have made a "statement" by moving to within three points of Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts - but head coach Danny Rohl says moving above Celtic into second place is "still not what we want".
content:
